Class FileInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm.FileInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copyable<FileInfo>, XSerializable

    public class FileInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements XSerializable, Copyable<FileInfo>
    Record class representing a file or directory on a local or remote (s)FTP(s) site.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.10.05.
